text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet (Pearl White/Red Floral)

Item features:
Snap-fit visor
In-Mold polycarbonate shell with EPS liner
Acu Dial fit system
20 vents
text.Response A: The Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet represents the pinnacle of safety, comfort and style. The revolutionary Acu Dial fit system provides a precise, custom fit in seconds. With its In-Mold polycarbonate shell and EPS liner, the Skyla is both light and durable while offering superior impact protection. The Skyla also features a snap-fit visor for enhanced aerodynamics and 20 vents to keep you cool and comfortable on even the hottest days.
text.Response B: The Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet (Pearl White/Red Floral) is the perfect combination of style and function. With its sleek, lightweight design and 20 vents, it will keep you cool and comfortable on even the longest rides. The Acu Dial fit system ensures a perfect fit, while the snap-fit visor provides extra protection from the sun. Made with an In-Mold polycarbonate shell and EPS liner, this helmet is built to last. So whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, the Skyla is the perfect choice for anyone who wants to look and feel great on the road.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

534.displayed_text:
Prompt

Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet (Pearl White/Red Floral)

Item features:
Snap-fit visor
In-Mold polycarbonate shell with EPS liner
Acu Dial fit system
20 vents

Response A

The Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet represents the pinnacle of safety, comfort and style. The revolutionary Acu Dial fit system provides a precise, custom fit in seconds. With its In-Mold polycarbonate shell and EPS liner, the Skyla is both light and durable while offering superior impact protection. The Skyla also features a snap-fit visor for enhanced aerodynamics and 20 vents to keep you cool and comfortable on even the hottest days.

Response B

The Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet (Pearl White/Red Floral) is the perfect combination of style and function. With its sleek, lightweight design and 20 vents, it will keep you cool and comfortable on even the longest rides. The Acu Dial fit system ensures a perfect fit, while the snap-fit visor provides extra protection from the sun. Made with an In-Mold polycarbonate shell and EPS liner, this helmet is built to last. So whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, the Skyla is the perfect choice for anyone who wants to look and feel great on the road.
